# Overview

Here, we'll provide a brief discussion how **`r pkg`** differs from and can interact with other packages. 


# diagram

Most similar to ours. Not ggplot.


# DiagrammeR

Can't do loops, acyclic. Requires specifying models in Mermaid or XY, non-R syntax.
